name: Quest-a-matics
description:
Quest-a-matics

This is a platformer game where the user controls the character to collect only the coins matching the theme of the level. For example, even numbers in the easy level. A correct answer earns 1 point while a wrong answer loses 1 point. There are also 3 lives which are lost if the player hits an enemy head-on or falls into lava. Enemies can be killed by jumping on them. The three level themes are:

  1. Easy: Even numbers
  2. Medium: Multiples of 7
  3. Hard: Prime numbers

To download Windows, macOS or Android versions, visit our homepage.
